entry.data:
MOSTLY CLEAR
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 60S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE MORNING, THEN MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH SHOWERS WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
LOCALLY HEAVY RAINFALL POSSIBLE IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

SHOWERS WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOCALLY HEAVY RAINFALL POSSIBLE IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH, BECOMING WEST WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN SUNNY IN THE AFTERNOON
COOLER
LESS HUMID WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
NORTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING SOUTHWEST AFTER MIDNIGHT

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S

CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 30 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT
